mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_goods ( id, goodsname, cid, unit, normal_price, cf_price, nums, note, `desc` ) VALUES (#{id},#{goodsname},#{cid},#{unit},#{normal_price},#{cf_price},#{nums},#{note},#{desc})
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.goodsname, g.cid, g.unit, g.normal_price, g.cf_price, g.nums, g.note, g.`desc`, g.`status` FROM b_goods g WHERE g.isdel = 0
